350cupmod.name: 350 Cup Mod
350cupmod.desc: If a Pokémon's BST is 350 or lower, all of its stats get doubled.

flippedmod.name: Flipped Mod
flippedmod.desc: Every Pokémon's stats are reversed. HP becomes Spe, Atk becomes Spc, Def stays the same.

scalemonsmod.name: Scalemons Mod
scalemonsmod.desc: Every Pokémon's stats, barring HP, are scaled to give them a BST as close to 500 as possible
